page.title: 06Local Facilities - Shopping
page.content: There is a{GENERAL STORES}and Newspaper Shop situated on the main road through Wolvey. Mr.and Mrs. Mitchell have owned the shop for about seven and a half years and they enjoy village life. Several people work in the shop and they serve on average some 200 customers a day. Mr. and Mrs. Dormer run the village{ {POST OFFICE.}They have been there for two years.{PENSIONERS}collect their pensions weekly from the Post Office. There are always people wishing to purchase stamps, post parcels and use the Girobank. Mr. and Mrs. Dormer also sell food, confectionery,stationery and fancy goods. Opposite the General Stores on the main road is the{SERVICE STATION}run by Mr. Bradbury. They have about 70 customers a day and repair about 20 cars a week.
